abilities.name: Sweep
about: Swings a melee weapon in a circle

abilities.name: Immortal Call
about: Encounter takes less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time

abilities.name: Leap Slam
about: Jumps into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with their weapon where they land. Enemies they would land on are pushed out of the way

abilities.name: Summon Ancestral Protector Totems
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter

abilities.name: Enduring Cry
about: Performs a warcry, taunting all nearby enemies to attack the encounter and granting endurance charges. Gives a brief burst of life regeneration, as well as a buff which grants resistances and physical damage reduction

abilities.name: Summon Guards
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter
